Name: Blinding Radiance
Description: Enemies around you receive 90% air damage. You receive a status that turns enemies in the 5m radius Blind.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Electric Discharge
Description: An electrical jolt deals 90% air damage to target character. Sets status Shocked.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Favourable Wind
Description: Control the forces of nature so the wind is literally at your party's back. An aura increases you allies' movement speed by 1.5m while they stay close to you.
Sets: Sets Favourable Winds Aura for 4 turn(s).

Name: Shocking Touch
Description: Sets the Shocked status on a target within arm's length and deals 110% air damage.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Teleportation
Description: Teleport a target character or item to a point of your choosing
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Closed Circuit
Description: Deals 220% Air Damage to enemies around you; then creates cursed static clouds on the edges of the spell.
Sets:
Sets Air Immunity for 1 turn(s).
Sets Shocked for 2 turn(s)
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence

Name: Chain Lightning
Description: Shoot a stunning bolt of lightning that forks up to 8 times in a 8m radius and deals 150% Air Damage to each target.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence

Name: Nether Swap
Description: Make two characters switch places. One of the characters can be you.

Name: Dazing Bolt
Description: An electrical bolt falls from the sky, dealing 120% Air Damage to characters and items in the area, and setting Shocked status.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Vacuum Aura
Description: Deal 80% Air Damage to enemies in the area. Caster receives an aura that sets Silence and Suffocating on enemies
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence

Name: Vacuum Touch
Description: Deal 80% Air Damage. Set Suffocation and Silence on target
Sets:
Sets Suffocating for 2 turn(s).
Sets Silenced for 1 turn(s).
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Breathing Bubble
Description: Creates a bubble of clean air around your head, allowing you to ignore effects of cloud surfaces. Immune to Suffocation and Silence.

Name: Mass Breathing Bubbles
Description: Set Breathing Bubbles on allies around you, allowing them to ignore effects of cloud surfaces and making them immune to Suffocation and Silence.
Sets: Sets Mass Breathing Bubbles for 5 turn(s).

Name: Evasive Aura
Description: Sets Evasive Aura for you and allies around you.

Name: Uncanny Evasion
Description: Target character's dodging is increased by 90% and your Movement Speed is increased by 20%.

Name: Blessed Smoke Cloud
Description: Conjure a cloud of thick blessed smoke that makes characters invisible.

Name: Smoke Cover
Description: Create a smoke cloud around you, hiding from sight.

Name: Thunderstorm
Description: A storm rages in the target area, hitting enemies with lightning bolts, each dealing 100% Air Damage.

Name: Apportation
Description: Transport pickupable items in the target area into your inventory.

Name: Superconductor
Description: Shoot forking spikes at all enemies within the area, dealing 100% Air Damage and setting Shocked.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Pressure Spike
Description: Condense all cloud surfaces in the area. Deals 70% Air Damage to enemies and douses fire.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Erratic Wisp
Description: Cause target character to teleport in a random direction each time they are attacked. Increases Air Resistance by 40%

Name: Tornado
Description: A tornado moves randomly around the battlefield, removing surfaces and revealing invisible characters. Also clears Invisible, Burning and Slowed.

Name: Vaporise
Description: Remove Petrified and Frozen from target character. Vaporise ground surfaces into clouds. Does not work on Oil, Ice or Lava surfaces

Name: Contamination
Description: Deals 55% Poison Damage to enemies and undead allies around you and can poison them. Turns water, blood surfaces and clouds in to poison!
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Fortify
Description: Provides [100% of total heal value] Physical Armour. While Fortified, the target cannot be teleported. Removes Poisoned, Bleeding, Burning, Acid, Decaying.

Name: Fossil Strike
Description: A giant rock with sticky oil that deals 85% Earth Damage. Creates an oil surface where it lands.
Stat: Damage is bases on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Poison Dart
Description: Cast a magical poisonous dart that does 100% Poison Damage, and creates a puddle of poison.
Stat: Damage is bases on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Impalement
Description: Spikes impale all characters and items, setting Crippled and dealing 100% Earth Damage. Also creates an oil puddle.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Acid Spores
Description: Shoot spores of corrosive acid, dealing 90% Poison Damage.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Turn to Oil
Description: Turn water and blood surfaces into oil. Remove Stun and Shocked from characters.

Name: Pyroclastic Eruption
Description: Multiple oil-filled rocks erupt from the caster at all enemies in the area. On impact, they create oil surfaces and deal 300% Earth Damage.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Siphon Poison
Description: Remove poison surfaces and clouds. Gain poison damage bonus to weapon attacks and weapon-based skills (dependent upon size of poison area cleared)

Name: Mend Metal
Description:
Allies near you start slowly regenerating Physical Armour.
Restore [26.5% of total heal value] Physical Armour for 3 turn(s).

Name: Earthquake
Description: Deals 100% Earth Damage and Knockdown enemy characters and items around you. Creates 8 random oil surfaces within the area
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Summon Hungry Flower
Description: Plant can lob acidic spores and emit cursed poison clouds.
Stat: The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

Name: Poison Wave
Description: Poison erupts from the caster in a circular wave, dealing 100% Poison Damage and forming poison clouds. Gives immunity to poison and earth damage for 1 turn
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Living Wall
Description: Vines sprout from the ground to block the path in the target area, emitting poison clouds around them.

Name: Reactive Armour
Description: Deal 20% physical damage, based on your current Physical Armour  , in a wave of metal spikes to everyone in the area (including yourself).
Stat: Damage is based on your current Physical Armour.

Name: Worm Tremor
Description: Deals 50% Earth Damage to each character in the area. Poisonous worms slither up from the earth, attaching to every character in the area. Affected characters cannot move or teleport, and they receive 30% Poison Damage each turn.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Corrosive Touch
Description: Destroy [110% of total damage value] Physical Armour on target character, and set Acid status.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Corrosive Spray
Description: Destroy [100% of total damage value] Physical Armour   on targets in a cone, and set Acid and Atrophy.
Sets:
Set Acid for 2 turn(s).
Set Atrophy for 1 turn(s).
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Throw Dust
Description: Throw dust at a character, blinding them and dealing 75% Earth Damage. Clears surfaces and clouds in the area.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Dust Blast
Description: Throw dust at all enemies in range, blinding them and dealing 100% Earth Damage.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence .

Name: Venom Coating
Description: Coat your weapon with poison, adding 60% Poison Damage to your weapon skills and attacks.

Name: Venomous Aura
Description: Allies in range receive Venom Coating, which adds 60% Poison Damage to weapon skills and attacks.

Name: Oily Carapace
Description: Consume oil surfaces around you and convert them to Physical Armour. Removes Slowed.
Stat: Restore up to [400% of total heal value] Physical Armour, depending on relevant surface area.

Name: Mass Oily Carapace
Description: Each ally consumes oil surfaces around them, converting the oil surfaces to Physical Armour . Removed Slowed.
Stat: Restore up to [400% of total heal value] Physical Armour, depending on relevant surface area.

Name: First Aid
Description: Heals target for [100% of total heal value] Vitality. Cures Crippled, Knocked Down, Blind, Silenced, Suffocating, Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned, Diseased, Plague, Infested
Stat: Restore [100% of total heal value] Vitality.

Name: Glitter Dust
Description: Target is marked, reducing its ability to dodge. Prevents target from going invisible.

Name: Marksman's Fang
Description: Shoot an arrow that goes straight through enemies. Each enemy that's hit takes 100% damage, ignoring armour.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Ricochet
Description: Fire a normal arrow that deals 90% damage and then finds another target within 5m. Forks up to 2 times.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Assassinate
Description: Attacking your target with meticulous aim, dealing 140% damage in one shot. When performed from stealth, this attack gains a 50% damage increase.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Arrow Spray
Description: Fire 16 arrows in a 60 degree arc. Each arrow deals 40% damage.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Tactical Retreat
Description: Apply haste to yourself, then teleport away from imminent danger.

Name: Pin Down
Description: Deals 120% damage and Cripple target character.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Arrow Storm
Description: 16 arrows fall from the sky in the target area, each dealing 40% Physical Damage.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Barrage
Description: Fire three arrows at three targets of your choice, each dealing 60% damage.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Reactive Shot
Description: Target a circular area. Until your next turn, you will reflexively shoot at the first three enemies moving within this area.

Name: Sky Shot
Description: Leap into the air before shooting, gaining damage bonuses for your superior height. Deals 100% Damage
Stat:
This skill receives high ground bonuses regardless of elevation.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Ballistic Shot
Description: A shot that deals 100% damage and receives 5% bonus damage per 1m distance to target
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Elemental Arrowheads
Description: Target a surface in melee radius. For two turns, 60% elemental damage matching that surface is added to your ranged weapon attacks and ranged weapon-based skills.

Name: Farsight
Description: Increase the range of a targeted character's ranged attacks and skills by 4m.

Name: Armour of Frost
Description: Ice forms a defensive barrier around the target, providing [100% of total heal value] Magical Armour . Cures Burning, Poisoned, Stunned, Frozen, Suffocating and Petrified.

Name: Hail Storm
Description: 20 ice shards fall from the sky, each dealing 20% Water Damage to characters within 13m range from impact.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Healing Ritual
Description: Shoot a bolt of healing energy that will jump to nearby allies.
Stat: Restore [80% of total heal value] Vitality

Name: Rain
Description: Create a spreading water surface which douses fires. Set Wet status on characters in the area.

Name: Restoration
Description: Restore Vitality of a target character. Restoration also cures Poisoned and Bleeding.
Stat: Restore [75% of total heal value] Vitality for 2 turn(s).

Name: Winter Blast
Description: Deal 110% Water Damage and set Chilled status on characters in the area. Freeze blood and water surfaces.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Steam Lance
Description: Releases a stream of Blessed Steam that heals characters in its path.
Stat: Restore [75% of total heal value] Vitality for 3 Turn(s)

Name: Global Cooling
Description: Set Chilled on enemies around you and deal 50% Water Damage. Freeze all succeptible surfaces.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Soothing Cold
Description: Regenerate Magical Armour  for all allies around caster.
Stat: Restore [26.5% of total heal value] Magic Armour for 3 turn(s).

Name: Ice Fan
Description: Target 3 positions and shoot an ice shard at each one, dealing 45% Water Damage and making targets Chilled.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Deep Freeze
Description: Targets in the cone that are frozen and under 10% Vitality shatter and instantly die. Otherwise they receive 150% Water Damage and become Frozen.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Cryogenic Stasis
Description: Target ally enters Cryogenic Stasis. Though incapacitated, they become immune to all damage, and heal over time. Removes Shackles Of Pain.
Stat: Restore [150% of total heal value] Vitality when Permafrost wears off

Name: Hail Strike
Description: Icicles fall from the sky, chilling enemies and dealing 40% water damage. They create Ice surfaces where they hit the ground.
Stat: Damages is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Arcane Stitch
Description: Fully restore target character's Magic Armour. Removes Frozen, Stunned, Petrified, Plague, Suffocating, Poisoned, Burning, Necrofire, Terrified, Silenced, Taunted, Mad.
Stat: Restore 100% Magic Armour

Name: Mass Cryotherapy
Description: Each ally consumes Frozen surfaces around them, converting the frozen surfaces to Magic Armour. Removes Burning and Necrofire.
Stat: Restore up to [400% of total heal value] Magic Armour depending on relevant surface area.

Name: Cryotherapy
Description: Consume Frozen surfaces around you and convert them to Magic Armour. Removes Burning and Necrofire.
Stat: Restore up to [400% of total heal value] Magic Armour depending on relevant surface area.

Name: Vampiric Hunger
Description: Set Vampiric Hunger on target character, adding 50% Life Steal for 2 turns. Life Steal heals you in proportion to the damage you deal to Vitality.

Name: Vampiric Hunger Aura
Description: Set Vampiric Hunger Aura on every ally around you, adding 50% Life Steal for 2 turns. Life Steal heals you in proportion to the damage you deal to Vitality.
Sets: Set Vampiric Hunger Aura for 2 Turn(s)

Name: Healing Tears
Description: Three healing tears circle around you. Everytime an ally walks into melee range near you, a healing tear bathes them.

Name: Mass Cleanse Wounds
Description: Heal yourself and allies around you. Create a water puddle beneath every target. Remove Necrofire, Burning, Diseased, Decaying, Poisoned, Bleeding, Suffocation and Acid.
Stat: Restore [150% of total heal value] Vitality

Name: Cleanse Wounds
Description: Heal target and create a water puddle beneath them. Remove Burning, Diseased, Decaying, Poisoned and Bleeding.
Stat: Restore [150% of total heal value] Vitality

Name: Ice Breaker
Description: Sets off a chain reaction that causes ice areas to explode into water puddles, dealing 450% Water Damage and setting Chilled.

Name: Blood Sucker
Description: Target character consumes blood surfaces around them, restoring Vitality. The more blood, the more they are healed!
Stat: Restore up to [200% of total heal value] Vitality, depending on relevant surface area.

Name: Decaying Touch
Description: Deal 100% physical damage to target character. Sets Decay, so the target will take physical damage from healing spells and potions.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Mosquito Swarm
Description:
Unleash a swarm of giant mosquitos to suck the blood from your enemies, dealing 100% physical damage and healing yourself.
Restore up to [100% of total heal value] Vitality, depending on the damage dealt.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Raining Blood
Description: Create blood surfaces. Set Bleeding on enemies. Douse fire surfaces.

Name: Shackles of Pain
Description: Mark a target so that it will receive all of the damage you receive. Damage transferred in this way ignores any resistances the target may have.
Sets: Set Shackles of Pain for 3 turn(s).

Name: Infect
Description: Deal 155% physical damage. Infect a target with a disease that will spread to other nearby characters. Diseased characters deal reduced damage with all attacks and have lowered Constitution.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Silencing Stare
Description: Destroy [100% of total damage value] Magic Armour and Silence all enemies in a cone in front of you.

Name: Totems of the Necromancer
Description: Spawn bone totems near every enemy in the area. Bone totems have ranged attacks that deal 100% physical damage.

Name: Last Rites
Description: Sacrifice yourself to bring an ally back to life. Deals [X] piercing damage to you, and resurrects target character with maximum Vitality.

Name: Grasp Of The Starved
Description: Undead hands rise from underground, attacking characters that stand in blood surfaces and clouds. Deals 250% physical damage to each character and sets Crippled.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Bone Cage
Description: Increases Physical Armour by [50% of total heal value] and another [50% of total heal value] Physical Armour for each corpse in the area around you.

Name: Black Shroud
Description: Create a cloud of cursed smoke in an area, setting Suffocating and Blind on all characters within.

Name: Death Wish
Description: Target character receives a damage bonus equal to the percentage of their lost Vitality. For example, a character with 30% Vitality will gain a 70% damage bonus.

Name: Raise Bone Widow
Description: Raise a walking pile of bones which can consume corpses to restore Vitality and receive a stacking damage buff.
Stat: The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

Name: Blood Storm
Description: The sky weeps bloody tears. Bolts of coagulated blood fall on enemy characters in the area, setting Disease and Decaying. Does 100% physical damage. Turns all water in the area into blood.
Range:
Range 17m
Radius 10m
Blood clot AoE radius 1m
Duration 2 turn(s)

Name: Raise Bloated Corpse
Description: Target a corpse to raise a bloated cadaver that fights for you. It can explode, dealing Physical Damage.

Name: Living on the Edge
Description: For 2 turns your character's Vitality cannot be reduced below 1 point, keeping them alive against all odds. If the target is a summon, their lifetime will be prolonged for the duration.

Name: Tentacle Lash
Description: Lash out at your opponent dealing 125% physical damage and setting Atrophy on them.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Strength.

Name: Chicken Claw
Description: Turn the target character into a chicken. Squawk!

Name: Bull Horns
Description: Magnificent horns sprout from your forehead, making you see red. You can rush at your enemies and gore them. Increases Retribution ability by 1 for the duration. Incompatible with Medusa Head.

Name: Bull Rush
Description: Rush at your enemies, dealing 75% weapon damage and setting Bleeding.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Strength.

Name: Chameleon Cloak
Description: Grants you the ability to blend in with any environment as if invisible.

Name: Heart of Steel
Description: Your heart pumps liquid metal, creating a robust layer of Physical Armor. This regenerates each turn.
Stat:
Provides [75% heal value] Physical Armour.
Restores [35% heal value] Physical Armour for 4 turn(s).

Name: Spread Your Wings
Description: Sprout temporary wings to fly when you move, allowing you to ignore ground surfaces. Incompatible with Spider Legs.
Sets: Sets wings for 3 turns. Allows use of the ability Fly.

Name: Flight
Description: Fly to a nearby point.

Name: Skin Graft
Description: Reset all cooldowns. Removes Burning, Necrofire, Poisoned and Bleeding.

Name: Summon Oily Blob
Description: Fling an Oil Blob at a target point, dealing 70% Earth Damage in the area. Oil Blob deals earth damage with melee attacks and leaves an oil puddle on death.
Stat:
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Strength.
The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

Name: Medusa Head
Description: Snakes grow out of your head, giving you a petrifying aura and the Petrifying Visage skill. Incompatible with Bull Horns.

Name: Petrifying Visage
Description: Deal 100% earth damage and Petrify enemies around you.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Strength.

Name: Spider Legs
Description: Spider legs burst from your back. You can create web surfaces in an area to entangle foes. Incompatible with Wings.
Sets:
Set Spider Legs for 3 turn(s).
Set Haste when sepping on a web

Name: Spin Web
Description: Create web surface to Entangle all characters in the area.

Name: Flay Skin
Description: Destroy [100% of total damage value] Magic Armour  on target character. Set status that halves resistances.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Strength.

Name: Flaming Skin
Description: You get immunity to fire, but lowered resistance to water. You bleed fire.

Name: Icy Skin
Description: You get immunity to water, but lowered resistance to fire. You bleed ice.

Name: Jellyfish Skin
Description: Bleed electrified water. You get immunity to electricity, but lowered resistance to poison and earth damage.

Name: Poisonous Skin
Description: You get immunity to poison and earth, but lowered resistance to air. You bleed poison.

Name: Forced Exchange
Description: Exchange Vitality percentages with target character.

Name: Apotheosis
Description: You take the first step towards godhood. The cost of all Source skills is reduced by -3 Source Point.

Name: Terrain Transmutation
Description: Target two circular areas. Swap surfaces and clouds.

Name: Equalise
Description: Vitality and Armour percentages of characters in target area are summed up and redistributed equally.

Name: Peace of Mind
Description: Target gains Clear-Minded, which increases Strength, Finesse, Intelligence by (1 + amount scaled by level), Wits by (2 + amount scaled by level). Removes Blinded, Terrified, Charmed, Taunted, Sleeping, Enraged and Mad.

Name: Haste
Description: Sets Hasted on target character. Hasted increases movement speed by 2m per AP and gives an additional 1 AP per turn. Clears Slowed and Crippled.

Name: Ignition
Description: Sets enemy characters around you on fire. Deals 40% Fire Damage to each. Ignites all susceptible surfaces.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Searing Daggers
Description:
Shoot three flaming daggers at targets of your choice, each creating a fire surface and dealing 25% fire damage
1m Explode Radius
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Spontaneous Combustion
Description: Deal 75% Fire Damage to target character. If the character is affected by Burning or Necrofire, remove those statuses and deal additional damage for each turn of duration remaining.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from your Intelligence.

Name: Fireball
Description: Hurl a fiery sphere that will explode, dealing 100% Fire Damage
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Bleed Fire
Description: Enemies will bleed fire when hit. Also creates a small fire area beneath each target and ignites surfaces in the area.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Summon Fire Slug
Description: Summon a Fire Slug. Your Fire Slug can create fire surfaces and launch linear fire attacks.
Stat: The stats of the summon will depend on the caster's level and summoning ability.

Name: Supernova
Description: Explode, creating fire surfaces and dealing 175% Fire Damage in a large area around you. (Except areas blocked by obstacles)
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Laser Ray
Description: Line of intese heat that deals 150% Fire Damage to characters and leaves fire clouds behind.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Flaming Crescendo
Description: Curse the target to explode after one turn or on death, dealing 175% Fire Damage in a 3m radius.

Name: Flaming Tongues
Description: Flaming tongues protect you, immediately attacking approaching enemies, dealing 100% Fire Damage.

Name: Fire Whip
Description: Long-range attack that deals 155% Fire Damage to a single target, leaving them blind and burning.
Sets:
Set Burning for 1 Turn(s).
Set Blinded for 1 Turn(s)
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Firebrand
Description: An aura that adds 50% Fire Damage for weapon skills and attacks for all allies near you.

Name: Corpse Explosion
Description: Explode the target corpse, dealing 250%  physical damage in the area

Name: Mass Corpse Explosion
Description: Explode all corpses around you, dealing physical damage in the area

Name: Sparking Swings
Description: Receive Sparkstriker status. This causes your melee attacks to create a 100% Fire Damage spark projectile that bounces off the initial target to hit the closest enemy.

Name: Master of Sparks
Description: Target character and surrounding allies receive Sparkmaster status that adds a chance of fiery sparks to melee attacks.

Name: Deploy Mass Traps
Description: Throw 4 explosive traps at target locations. Each trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it.

Name: Throw Explosive Trap
Description: Throw an explosive trap at target locations. Trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it.

Name: Meteor Shower
Description: 25 fireballs come crashing from the sky. Each does 20% Fire Damage within a 3m range from impact.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Epidemic of Fire
Description: Fire a cursed flame that will fork on impact up to 5 times, dealing 150% Fire Damage and leaving a cursed fire surface in its wake.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Mass Sabotage
Description: Explode two random grenades or arrows in the inventories of any enemy in a target circle.

Name: Sabotage
Description: If target character is carrying grenades or arrows, a random one explodes in their inventory.

Name: Adrenaline
Description: Gain 2 Action Points immediately, but lose 2 Action Points next turn. Any Action Points over your maximum are lost.

Name: Chloroform
Description:
Destroys [X] Magical Armour  and then tries to set Sleeping.
Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Finesse.

Name: Sawtooth Knife
Description: Pierce the enemy's Physical Armour and directly deals 100% piercing damage. Sets Bleeding if enemy has no Physical Armour.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Throwing Knife
Description: Throw a knife at your opponent, dealing 85% damage. Can backstab!
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse

Name: Backlash
Description: Jump over the enemy, landing behind their back and backstabbing them for 85% damage.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse

Name: Cloak and Dagger
Description: Teleport without breaking sneaking.

Name: Fan of Knives
Description: Fling a dagger at every enemy around you, dealing 125% damage. Can backstab!
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Terrifying Cruelty
Description: Dagger attack that deals 110% damage and sets Bleeding and Fear on target character.
Sets:
Set Bleeding for 3 turn(s).
Set Terrified for 1 turn(s).
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Mortal Blow
Description: Deal 140% damage. Damage is doubled if you are sneaking or invisible. Target is killed instantly if below 20% Vitality.
Stat:
Instantly kill target below 20% Vitality.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Wind-Up Toy
Description: Summon a mechanical bomber at the target point. The bomber can explode, dealing fire damage and producing a fire surface.
Stat: The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

Name: Sleeping Arms
Description: Deal 100% damage and set Atrophy: your target can't use weapons or weapon skills anymore.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Daggers Drawn
Description: Whirl into a barrage of 5 stabs, each dealing 65% damage.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Rupture Tendons
Description: Deal 100% damage to target character. When they try to move, they will take piercing damage.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Corrupted Blade
Description: Dagger attack that deals 150% damage and sets Decay and Diseased.
Sets:
Set Decaying for 2 turn(s).
Set Diseased for 2 turn(s).
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Gag Order
Description: Destroy [X] Magical Armour  on target character. Silence target.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

Name: Conjure Incarnate
Description: Conjure a personal elemental that matches the ground surface it's summoned onto. Your incarnate can be buffed with Infusions. Once you hit Summoning ability level of 10, a colossal Incarnate Champion will answer your summons!
Stat: The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

Name: Dimensional bolt
Description: Shoot a volatile bolt that deals 100% of a random type, and then creates a corresponding surface
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Elemental Totem
Description: Target a ground surface and conjure a totem of the corresponding element. Each turn, this totem will fire a projectile at enemies in sight.
Stat: The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

Name: Farsight Infusion
Description: Unlock a ranged attack for your Incarnate. Provides [100% of total heal value]  Magical Armour

Name: Power Infusion
Description: Unlock Whirlwind and Rush for your Incarnate. Provides [100% of total heal value] Physical Armour  .

Name: Rallying Cry
Description:
Target character regenerates Vitality and Magic Armour according to the number of allied characters and totems in their vicinity.
Restore [50% of total heal value] Vitality and  [18% of total heal value] Magic Armour.
Multiplied by the number of friendly characters in a 6 meter radius around the target.

Name: Supercharger
Description: Target totem or summon deals 100%  more base damage during its next turn, but then it dies.

Name: Cannibalise
Description: Destroy an allied summon or totem. Receive their Vitality, Physical Armour and Magic Armour.

Name: Door to Eternity
Description: Give all summons around you a status that prevents them from dying to damage or disappearing when their life runs out.

Name: Ethereal Storm
Description: Unpredictable projectiles from distant planes strike target area, dealing random elemental damage to enemies or healing allies.

Name: Planar Gateway
Description: Conjure two linked gateways that allow any character to instantly travel between them.

Name: Soul Mate
Description: Bind yourself to target character, copying any healing and Armour restoration that you receive to them. Clears Frozen, Stunned, Knocked Down and Petrified.

Name: Warp Infusion
Description: Incarnate learns a teleport skill, and a skill to swap places with its master.

Name: Shadow Infusion
Description: Incarnate learns how to go invisible and strike foes with a corrosive slash.

Name: Dominate Mind
Description: Charm target non-allied character, causing them to join your side in combat for the duration of the status.

Name: Necrofire Infusion
Description: Change Incarnate's element to necrofire, unlocking Fireball and Epidemic Of Fire.

Name: Ice Infusion
Description: Change Incarnate's element to blessed ice, unlocking Restoration and Steam Lance.

Name: Electric Infusion
Description: Change Incarnate's element to electricity, unlocking Electric Discharge.

Name: Fire Infusion
Description: Change Incarnate's element to fire, unlocking Fireball.

Name: Poison Infusion
Description: Change Incarnate's element to poison, unlocking Poison Dart.

Name: Water Infusion
Description: Change Incarnate's element to water, unlocking Restoration.

Name: Summon Inner Demon
Description: Conjure a demon that will share their Intelligence with you and provide [X] Magical Armour . Grants you power to terrify and protect yourself with demonic fists.

Name: Demonic Tutelage
Description: Your inner demon actively watches over you. When an enemy approaches melee range, they will be pummelled by a demonic fist dealing physical damage.
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Terrify
Description: Destroy [X] Magic Armour on target enemy. They are Terrified for 2 turn(s).
Stat: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.

Name: Acid Infusion
Description: Change Incarnate's element to acid, unlocking Poison Dart and Acid Spores.

Name: Cursed Electric Infusion
Description: Change Incarnate's element to cursed electricity, unlocking Electric Discharge and Closed Circuit.

Name: Summon Cat Familiar
Description: Summon a black cat by your side.
Stat: The stats of the summon will depend on caster level and Summoning ability..

Name: Summon Condor
Description: Summons a condor that will aid you in combat.
Stat: The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

Name: Summon Dragonling
Description: Summons a newt to help you in combat.
Stat: The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

Name: Battering Ram
Description: Rush forward in a straight line, to a designated point, hitting all enemies in your path for 50% damage and setting Knockdown.
Requirements:
Requires Warfare 1
Requires a Melee Weapon
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from [Weapon Attribute].

Name: Battle Stomp
Description: Smash your weapon into the ground, knocking down non-allied characters in front of you, and hitting them for 60% damage. Also clears non-cursed surfaces and clouds.
Requirements:
Requires Warfare 1
Requires a Melee Weapon
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from [Weapon Attribute].

Name: Crippling Blow
Description: Cripple the target with a sweeping blow, and all characters around it. Deals 115% damage.
Requirements:
Requires Warfare 1
Requires a Melee Weapon
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from [Weapon Attribute].

Name: Enrage
Description: Motivate an allied character with the power of rage. Target allied character is guaranteed to land critical hits with basic attacks and weapon skills, but is muted. Clears Taunted, Terrified, Charmed, Mad and Clear-Minded statuses.

Name: Whirlwind
Description: Perform a whirlwind attack, hitting enemies around you for 100% damage.
Requirements:
Requires Warfare 2
Requires a Melee Weapon
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from stat of equipped weapon.

Name: Blitz Attack
Description: Jump from one target to another, hitting up to 2 targets, dealing 70% damage to each. Targets are chosen randomly in a 10m radius.
Requirements:
Requires Warfare 2
Requires a Melee Weapon
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from [Weapon Attribute].

Name: Phoenix Dive
Description: Leap through the air to a target position, creating a fire surface upon landing.

Name: Overpower
Description: Deals 150% damage. If your Physical Armour is higher than your opponent's, destroy all their Physical Armour. Can set Knocked Down.
Requirements:
Requires Warfare 5
Requires a Melee Weapon
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Strength.

Name: Thick of the fight
Description: The more the merrier! Gain a damage boost for every nearby character.
Sets: Set Thick of the Fight for 2 turn(s).

Name: Guardian Angel
Description: Allies in melee range redirect 50% of received damage to you.
Sets: Set Guardian Angel Aura for 2 turn(s).

Name: Provoke
Description: Taunt the enemies around you. Provoke and tease them so that they want to attack you.

Name: Bouncing Shield
Description: Throw your shield at an enemy dealing 70% Physical Damage. Shield can bounce to another enemy in 5m range.
Stat: Damage is based on the Physical Armour of your shield.

Name: Onslaught
Description: Attack five times with astonishing speed, each hit dealing 60% damage.
Requirements:
Requires Warfare 3
Requires a Melee Weapon
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Strength.

Name: Challenge
Description: Mark target enemy. If they die in the next 2 turns, you are healed and receive damage and armour bonuses. If target survives, their Vitality is healed to full and caster receives damage.
Sets: Set Challenge to target for 3 turn(s).

Name: Deflective Barrier
Description: Projectiles that hit you are reflected back at the caster. This does not prevent the original projectile effects. Provides [X]Physical Armour .

Name: Bless
Description: Bless target character or surface.

Name: Source Vampirism
Description: Consume a corpse to gain a Source Point, or steal a Source Point from a living character.

Name: Curse
Description: Curse target character or surface.

Name: Spirit Vision
Description: Your eyes pierce the veil of the Hall of Echoes.

Name: Charm Voidwoken
Description: Charm target voidwoken, causing them to join your side in combat for the duration of the status.

Name: Flesh Sacrifice
Description: Gain 1 Action Point immediately and a 10% damage boost for 2 turns at the cost of -[X] Constitution. Any Action Points over your maximum are lost.

Name: Encourage
Description: Encourage allies around you, increasing their primary attributes.

Name: Dragon's Blaze
Description: Breathes flames in a cone, dealing [X] Fire damage and leaves fire behind.
Stat: Damage is based on your level

Name: Play Dead
Description:
Fool enemies into thinking you're dead. Cooldown of skills will be paused. Any action you take will cancel this status.
Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking.

Name: Petrifying Touch
Description: Turn a nearby target to stone, incapacitating it. Deal [X] Earth damage. Removes Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned and Crippled.
Stat: Damage is based on your level

Name: Dome of Protection
Description: Create a magical field that restores Magic and Physical Armour and increases elemental resistances on allies in the area.

Name: Summon Ifan's Soul Wolf
Description: Summons your trusty Soul Wolf, which can Howl and Bite enemies.
Stat: The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

Name: Maddening Song
Description: Sing, causing characters in your target area to become Mad. Maddened characters will attack those nearest them, regardless of alignment.

Name: Demonic Stare
Description: Drain [X] Magical Armour  from target character and gain that amount yourself.
Stat: Damage is based on your level

Name: Break the Shackles
Description: Remove the following negative status effects from yourself: Slowed,  Crippled, Chilled, Shocked, Suffocating, Atrophy, Diseased, Infectious Diseased, Silence, Plagued and Shackles of Pain.

Name: Blinding Squall
Description: A storm approaches and strong winds rise. They Blind and deal [X] Air damage to characters in the target area.
Stat: Damage is based on your level

Name: Time Warp
Description: Target a character. Whenever this character ends a turn in combat, they immediately get a free turn.

Name: Sucker Punch
Description: An unexpected blow, that deals [X] physical damage and knocks down target.
Stat: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Strength.

Name: Shields Up
Description: Restore the Physical Armour  and Magical Armour  of your shield

Name: Deafening Shriek
Description: Remove [X-Y] Magic Armour from enemies around you and set Deaf, reducing Wits, Accuracy and Dodging.
Sets:
Set Deaf for 2 turn(s)
 Range 8m radius
Stat: Damage is based on your level
